resources.string: Think about your own team name
the final word can be guessed by all the teams
The current game will be deleted
Alias is an educational team game which goal is to explain words.

Each player of the team have to explain to the teammates as many words displayed on the screen as possible. It’s forbidden to use conjugates, to use gestures while explaining or to translate the words to foreign languages.

Each guessed word brings +1 point to the team, and each passed word brings -1 point. If the team did not have time to answer the last word - the word is not read and the team gets 0 points for this word. In the settings you can sign “last word for everyone” – this way each team can to guess the last word and to get +1 point.

The game continues until one of the teams will get the necessary words number at the end of the round. If there are more than one winner with the same number of points, the game continues until the winner is determined.
The round progress will not be saved
Alias is a friends game. Add at least two participating teams with a minimum two team members.
It is the game settings. Select the number of words for winning the game, round time and if the last word is for common guessing.
Here you can select the difficulty of the words of the game and the language of this words.

One team member should explain to teammates as many words displayed on the screen as possible. It’s forbidden to use conjugates, to use gestures while explaining or to translate the words to foreign languages. \n\nWhen team guesses the word swipe the card up. It will bring you +1 point. To skip the word swipe the card down. It will bring you -1 point.
Here you can change the results of the round if you swiped the card mistake or there were violations of the rules of the game.
